about.name: Carmel-by-the-Sea
about.info_text: Carmel-by-the-Sea, often simply referred to as Carmel, is a picturesque coastal town located in Monterey County, California. Known for its natural beauty, artistic community, and European-style charm, Carmel is a popular destination for travelers seeking a serene and idyllic escape. The town's quaint streets, white sandy beaches, and scenic landscapes make it a favorite among artists and those looking for a tranquil getaway.
about.facts_text:
Location: Monterey County, California, USA
Time Zone: Pacific Time Zone (UTC-08:00)
Language: English
Currency: US Dollar (USD)
about.climate_text: Carmel enjoys a mild coastal climate with cool, wet winters and warm, dry summers. The average temperature ranges from 50°F (10°C) in winter to 65°F (18°C) in summer, making it a pleasant year-round destination.

attractions_card.title: Carmel Beach
attractions_card.description: Carmel Beach is a pristine and dog-friendly white sand beach, perfect for a leisurely stroll, sunbathing, or watching a beautiful sunset.

attractions_card.title: 17-Mile Drive
attractions_card.description: The 17-Mile Drive is a scenic road that passes through famous golf courses, coastal viewpoints, and the iconic Lone Cypress tree.

attractions_card.title: Carmel Mission Basilica
attractions_card.description: The Carmel Mission Basilica, also known as Mission San Carlos Borromeo del Río Carmelo, is a historic and beautiful Spanish mission.

attractions_card.title: Point Lobos State Natural Reserve
attractions_card.description: Point Lobos is a protected coastal area with hiking trails, diverse wildlife, and stunning ocean views, ideal for nature lovers and hikers.

attractions_card.title: Art Galleries
attractions_card.description: Carmel is home to numerous art galleries featuring the works of local and international artists, making it an artistic hub.

attractions_card.title: Fairy Tale Cottages
attractions_card.description: Carmel is famous for its whimsical and fairytale-like cottages with unique architecture and charming gardens.

attractions_card.title: Carmel Plaza
attractions_card.description: Carmel Plaza is a shopping center with upscale boutiques, restaurants, and specialty stores.

attractions_card.title: Scenic Drives
attractions_card.description: Exploring the scenic drives along the coast and through the neighboring communities offers breathtaking coastal vistas.

food_card.title: Seafood
food_card.description: Carmel offers a variety of seafood options, including fresh catches like abalone, oysters, and clam chowder.

food_card.title: Farm-to-Table Dining
food_card.description: Experience the farm-to-table movement with fresh, locally sourced ingredients at many of Carmel's restaurants.

food_card.title: Wine Tasting
food_card.description: Carmel Valley, just a short drive away, is known for its wineries, offering wine tasting tours and vineyard visits.

food_card.title: Artisanal Chocolates
food_card.description: Indulge in artisanal chocolates and sweet treats at local chocolatiers and confectioneries.

food_card.title: Alfresco Dining
food_card.description: Enjoy dining on outdoor patios with ocean views, creating a memorable culinary experience.

hotels_card.title: Cypress Inn
hotels_card.description: Cypress Inn is a pet-friendly boutique hotel with Mediterranean-style architecture, co-owned by actress Doris Day.

hotels_card.title: La Playa Carmel
hotels_card.description: La Playa Carmel is a historic hotel offering elegant accommodations and lush gardens, just steps from the beach.

hotels_card.title: Tally Ho Inn
hotels_card.description: Tally Ho Inn is a charming inn with cozy rooms and English country-style ambiance, located in a tranquil forest setting.

hotels_card.title: Carmel Mission Inn
hotels_card.description: Carmel Mission Inn provides comfortable accommodations, an outdoor heated pool, and easy access to nearby attractions.

hotels_card.title: Vacation Rentals
hotels_card.description: Carmel offers vacation rentals and cottages for those seeking a more homey and private stay.

transport_card.title: Monterey Regional Airport
transport_card.description: Monterey Regional Airport (MRY) is the nearest airport, located approximately 7 miles away from Carmel.

transport_card.title: Highway 1
transport_card.description: Highway 1 offers a scenic route along the California coast, providing access to Carmel and its neighboring towns.

transport_card.title: Carmel Trolley
transport_card.description: The Carmel Trolley is a charming way to explore the town, with stops at major attractions and points of interest.

transport_card.title: Biking
transport_card.description: Carmel is a bike-friendly town, and renting a bicycle is a great way to explore the area and its scenic byways.

transport_card.title: Walking
transport_card.description: Carmel's small size and pedestrian-friendly streets make walking a convenient way to explore the town.
